site.title: Itran Web – Modern Web Solutions
site.description: Itran Web is a Moroccan web design and development agency that builds modern, high-performance websites and digital experiences to help businesses grow online.

hero.description: We build fast, stunning websites that elevate your brand and drive results—on time and tailored to your goals.

features.title: Why Choose Our Agency?
features.subtitle: We don't just build websites — we build digital experiences that grow your business.

customDesign.title: Stunning Custom Design
customDesign.description: Unique, modern designs crafted specifically for your brand — no templates, no compromises.

fastDelivery.title: Fast & Reliable Delivery
fastDelivery.description: From concept to launch in record time, without sacrificing quality or performance.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile-First Approach
mobileFirst.description: Fully responsive websites that look and work flawlessly on every device and screen size.

secureOptimized.title: Secure & Optimized
secureOptimized.description: Built with best practices: SEO-ready, lightning-fast, and protected against threats.

conversion.title: Designed to Convert
conversion.description: Strategic layouts and clear calls-to-action that turn visitors into customers.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: We're with you every step of the way — from planning to post-launch and beyond.

metadata.title: About
metadata.description: Itran Web is a Moroccan web agency founded by two expert developers. We build fast, custom, conversion-focused websites for restaurants, e-commerce brands, and creative studios across Casablanca, Rabat, and beyond.

hero.title: About Itran Web
hero.description: A Moroccan web design and development agency crafting high-performance websites for businesses that demand more than just a digital brochure.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.paragraph1: Itran Web is a boutique web agency based in Morocco, co-founded by two passionate developers and designers who believe your website should be a strategic asset—not a cost center.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: Since 2025, we’ve partnered with restaurants, e-commerce brands, creative studios, and startups across Casablanca, Rabat, Marrakech, and Tangier to build websites that are fast, secure, mobile-first, and built to convert.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower Moroccan and international businesses with custom digital experiences that reflect their brand, engage their audience, and drive measurable growth—without relying on templates or bloated platforms.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Businesses Trust Itran Web
benefits: 100% Custom Development – No WordPress templates. No drag-and-drop compromises.
Blazing-Fast Performance – Optimized for Core Web Vitals and Google rankings.
Mobile-First Design – Fully responsive on all devices (phones, tablets, desktops).
SEO-Ready Structure – Clean code, semantic HTML, and fast load times built in.
Dedicated Support – Direct access to the two founders—no account managers.
On-Time Delivery – We respect your deadlines and launch when promised.

workAndExpertise.title: Our Work & Expertise
workAndExpertise.intro: We specialize in three core types of websites for Moroccan and global clients:
projects: Restaurant & Hospitality Websites – Like La Maison Roaa, featuring online reservation systems, multilingual support, and elegant design.
Creative Agency Dashboards – Such as Digihive Studio, with custom project management and client portals.
Premium E-commerce Platforms – Including RGB Glow, a secure, scalable online store for cosmetics with seamless checkout.

localPresence.title: Serving Morocco with Global Standards
localPresence.description1: While we’re proudly based in Morocco, our development practices follow international standards. We serve clients in:
localPresence.cities: Casablanca • Rabat • Marrakech • Tangier • Agadir — and remotely worldwide.
localPresence.description2: Whether you need a website in French, Arabic, English, or bilingual, we build with localization in mind.

cta.title: Ready to Build Your Website?
cta.description: We only take on a few projects at a time to ensure quality and attention. If you’re looking for a reliable, fast, and strategic web partner in Morocco—let’s talk.

contact.title: Contact
contact.name: Name
contact.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
contact.errorFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again.
contact.globeText: Presenting you with the best UI possible.

cta2.title: Let's Get In Touch.
cta2.description: Your laboratory instruments should serve you, not the other way around. We're happy to help you.

company.name: Itran Web
company.description: Building beautiful and functional web experiences with modern technologies. We help startups and businesses create their digital presence.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore some of our recent work.

metadata.title: Our Services
metadata.description: Professional web development, design, marketing, and Google Ads services to grow your business online.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.description: Professional digital solutions tailored to your business needs. From web development to marketing, we've got you covered.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Let's discuss your project and find the perfect solution for your business needs.

metadata.title: Frequently Asked Questions
metadata.description: Find answers to common questions about our web development, design, and marketing services.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services and processes.

items.q: How long does it take to build a website?
items.a: The timeline depends on the complexity of your project. A simple website typically takes 2-4 weeks, while more complex projects can take 6-8 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

items.q: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
items.a: Yes! We offer comprehensive post-launch support including maintenance, updates, security monitoring, and technical assistance. Our support packages are tailored to your specific needs.

items.q: Can you help with SEO and digital marketing?
items.a: Absolutely! We offer full-service digital marketing including SEO optimization, Google Ads management, social media marketing, and content creation to help your business grow online.
We use modern technologies like Next.js, React, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS to build fast, secure, and scalable websites. We also work with WordPress and other platforms when appropriate.

items.q: Do you work with international clients?
items.a: Yes! While we're based in Morocco, we work with clients worldwide. We offer services in English, French, and Arabic, and can accommodate different time zones.

items.q: What's included in your web design service?
items.a: Our web design service includes custom UI/UX design, responsive layouts, brand integration, user experience optimization, and design revisions until you're completely satisfied.
